bodyHtml: 11This Preface was written in 1977, in response to many requests for a brief introduction to A Course in Miracles. 2The first two parts—How It Came; What It Is—Helen Schucman wrote herself; the final part—What It Says—was written by the process of inner dictation described in the Preface.
